howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.description: Welcome to DESCENT! Fall endlessly through the tunnel, dodge obstacles, and battle other players!
howToPlay.singleplayerDesc: Play alone against time. Fall as deep as possible and reach the highest score!
howToPlay.multiplayerDesc: Join public or private servers. Battle other players and become the best player!
howToPlay.desktop: Desktop: Arrow keys ← → or A/D to dodge
howToPlay.mobile: Mobile: Tap left/right on the screen to dodge
howToPlay.powerupDesc: Collect power-ups during gameplay for temporary advantages!
howToPlay.powerupEffect: Effect: 2.5x stronger force - push opponents away!
howToPlay.powerupActivate: Activation: Press SPACE when 'POWERUP READY' is shown
howToPlay.objective: Objective: Survive as long as possible, dodge obstacles, and collect power-ups!
howToPlay.tip1: The deeper you fall, the faster you go - be careful!
howToPlay.tip2: Power-ups are your best friend - use them strategically!
howToPlay.tip3: In Multiplayer: Use power-ups to push opponents away!
howToPlay.tip4: Every 1000m the tunnel color changes - that's a milestone!
howToPlay.tip5: Watch your health - collisions with walls cause damage!
